DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Study Monitor Checklist Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether there was a group or entity responsible for the appropriate oversight and monitoring of the conduct of a clinical study, as part of the list of items required for a clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the group or entity responsible for the appropriate oversight and monitoring of the conduct of a clinical study, as part of the list of items required for a clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

Concepts.definition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

Property.preferredDefinition: An individual who over a period of time checks on and maintains continuous observation of state, condition, situation, or process as a check on output, efficiency, incorrect conduct etc. and warns of faults, or gives advice and instruction by way of reporting or caution.:A list of items required or things to be done or considered.

Concepts.definition: An organization, individual, group, or body responsible for the appropriate oversight and monitoring of the conduct of a clinical study.  This is done to ensure the safety of participants and the validity and integrity of the study data.
A list of items required or things to be done or considered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
